## hasSupportsAtRuleAncestor() function

Check if a node has a `@supports` at-rule ancestor with a given regex in its params.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function hasSupportsAtRuleAncestor(node: Node, predicate: {
    test(str: string): boolean;
}): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  node | Node | The node to check |
|  predicate | { test(str: string): boolean; } | The test to match against the <code>@supports</code> at-rule's params |

**Returns:**

boolean
